Record.ClassificationPath: Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Nutrition Disorders/Malnutrition/Deficiency Diseases/Avitaminosis/Vitamin B Deficiency/Riboflavin Deficiency
Record.Description: A dietary deficiency of riboflavin causing a syndrome chiefly marked by cheilitis, angular stomatitis, glossitis associated with a purplish red or magenta-colored tongue that may show fissures, corneal vascularization, dyssebacia, and anemia. (Dorland, 27th ed)
